title: Today's best Black Friday TV deal is this 55-inch 4K smart TV on sale for just $299.99
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Grab this cheap TV deal at Best Buy just ahead of Black Friday
article: Black Friday TV deals are starting to roll in, and we've just spotted a shockingly low price on a mid-size 4K TV. Best Buy has this Insignia 55-inch 4K smart TV that's on sale for just $299.99 (was $549.99). That's a $250 discount and an incredible price for a feature-packed mid-size 4K TV. This insignia set is packed with premium features, and todays' record-low price makes it one of the best Black Friday TV deals we've spotted so far. For just $299.99, you're getting a 55-inch TV with 4K HD resolution, smart capabilities, with the Fire TV experience for seamless streaming, and an Alexa voice remote for hands-free control. We predict this will be one of this year's hottest Black Friday deals, so we'd grab this fantastic offer now before it's too late.
